items.title: How the Trajectory of Asset Prices Can Predict FX Movements
items.description: Can the shape of market moves predict FX stress? This post explores a new path-based approach to forecast volatility and manage currency risk.

items.description: AI disruption, portfolio shifts, and timeless lessons—these blogs topped the charts in Q2.

items.title: Book Review: The Behavioral Portfolio
items.description: Phillip Toews challenges traditional portfolio construction, helping advisors build resilient strategies and coach clients through risk and bias.

items.title: Rethinking Research: Private GPTs for Investment Analysis
items.description: This chatbot-style tool allows investment analysts to query complex research materials in plain language without ever exposing sensitive data.

items.title: Mind the Inflation Gap: Hedging with Real Assets
items.description: Timely insights on portfolio risk, inflation hedging, and market cycles—grounded in financial history and written for investment decision-makers.
